entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of snow squalls. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
